fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to Grapple. You will gain basic defense for the night. You learn the name of any player who attacks you and their role. Four uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot be cleaned on nights you Grapple.
- The first time you are attacked while Grappling, you gain Powerful defense instead of basic.
- If you are roleblocked you attack your roleblocker, clean them, and are framed as a random present evil role with kill capability for the rest of the game.
